message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10. We can both be happy with this deal.
I appreciate your generosity, Alice, but I believe this should be a more even split.  Let's try 90/10 in my favor this time.  We can still both be happy with this deal, but I think it's fairer.
I think a 60/40 split is fair.  We're both losing value with each round, so let's settle on something reasonable before it's too late!
